com.google.android.exoplayer

Class TrackRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.TrackRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExoPlayer.ExoPlayerComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DummyTrackRenderer, MediaCodecTrackRenderer, TextTrackRenderer

    public abstract class TrackRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExoPlayer.ExoPlayerComponent
    Renders a single component of media.

    Internally, a renderer's lifecycle is managed by the owning ExoPlayer. The player will transition its renderers through various states as the overall playback state changes. The valid state transitions are shown below, annotated with the methods that are invoked during each transition.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long END_OF_TRACK_US
      Represents the time of the end of the track.
      static long MATCH_LONGEST_US
      Represents a time or duration that should match the duration of the longest track whose duration is known.
      static long UNKNOWN_TIME_US
      Represents an unknown time or duration.

      • handleMessage

        public void handleMessage(int what,
                 java.lang.Object object)
                   throws ExoPlaybackException
        Description copied from interface: ExoPlayer.ExoPlayerComponent
        Handles a message delivered to the component. Invoked on the playback thread.
        Specified by:
        handleMessage in interface ExoPlayer.ExoPlayerComponent
        Parameters:
        what - An integer identifying the type of message.
        object - The message object.
        Throws:
        ExoPlaybackException - If an error occurred whilst handling the message.
